com.camerontec.catalys.server.compliance

Class ComplianceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.compliance.ComplianceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComplianceFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractConcurrentOrderFilter, ExposureFilter, MarketModeFilter, OrderValueFilter, PercentageFromAuctionPriceFilter, PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter, PriceStepsFromAuctionPriceFilter, PriceStepsFromReferencePriceFilter, SecurityFilter, SecurityTypeFilter, ValidityFilter

    public abstract class ComplianceFilter
extends Object
implements IComplianceFilter
    ComplianceFilter is an abstract base class implemented by all compliance filters.
    Author:
    Tom Vasak, Hugh Emberson

      • isAutoReject

        public boolean isAutoReject()
        Should the breach of this filter result in a reject message being sent back or in manual intervention.
        Returns:
        true iff a reject message should be sent in response to a breach of this filter.

      • validate

        public abstract void validate(FromFixFilterContext context,
                              IFIXMessage message)
                       throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IComplianceFilter
        Check whether the filter is satisfied. An exception is thrown if the filter is breached. If the filter is disabled, it is implicitly satisfied.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface IComplianceFilter
        Parameters:
        context - Filter context
        message - Fix message
        Throws:
        FilterBreachException - when filter is breached.
        Exception - if there is a problem with validation.
